task-wr.title: Installing Titanium Server as the Primary Region
task-wr.shortdesc: The installation of Titanium Server as the Primary Region is the same as a standard installation.

prereq.p: The system must meet the requirements given in .

info.p: Refer to the Titanium Server installation guide that pertains to your system, either Titanium Server Installation for Systems with Controller Storage or Titanium Server Installation for Systems with Dedicated Storage. Install Titanium Server in accordance with those instructions when using it as the Primary Region.
